text: no worries. i do this all the time (only with a text field instead). we often want our meta title to have more info than we want to print on the blog.  i do it enough that i saved a couple snippet for it which includes an if statement to prevent previous blog entries from not showing anything as the title on the page.  feel free to use it.  You will want to substitute the text tag for a rich text tag for your purposes
glad <@U26DA9CQ0> was a long for the ride :wink:
